column4: hey i have a question about running dual boot with ubuntu and windows 7
i have installed ubuntu side by side already but when i restart the computer it doesnt ask me if i want to start it in ubuntu or windows it just automatically goes to windows
how do i get it to let me choose
do i have to edit the bios setting or something?
nope I would just try  to boot using the l;ive cd and reinstall grub on the MBR
Master Boot Reccord == whre the PC first boot
you installed ubuntu first then windows ??? or the opposite ?
ok and you never got a boot menu right ?
try either 3) or 2) with the live cd
on the klink there is multiple possible ways
2) uses the live (installation) cd, you start with it all the way to the desktop then open a console and try their procedure
with grub reinstalled it should replace the windows boot loader
